entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 26 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
